title: YOLO-AD-Framework
description: Comparative research‑driven framework using YOLOv5, YOLOv8 etc. for anomaly detection in video streams.

title: Face Recognition & Attendance
description: Real‑time face recognition system using webcam and OpenCV; logs attendance with timestamps.

title: Anomaly Detection (Fire & Theft)
description: Hackathon project detecting fire & theft anomalies using YOLOv8 and custom tracking in video streams.

title: Train Custom YOLO Model
description: End-to-end custom YOLO model training pipeline using Colab—data prep, labeling, training, inference.

title: AI Virtual Mouse
description: Hand‑gesture controlled virtual mouse using Mediapipe and OpenCV for hands‑free interaction.
